titles.title: I Have Decided To Follow Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have decided to follow Jesus, I have decided to follow Jesus, I have decided to follow Jesus, No turning back, no turning back.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tho’ no one join me, still I will follow, Tho’ no one join me, still I will follow, Tho’ no one join me, still I will follow, No turning back, no turning back.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The world behind me, the cross before me, The world behind me, the cross before me, The world behind me, the cross before me, No turning back, no turning back.{/lang-eng}
